title: Penny Serenade
cast_members: Irene Dunne|Cary Grant|Beulah Bondi|Edgar Buchanan|Ann Doran|Eva Lee Kuney|Leonard Willey|Wallis Clark|Walter Soderling|Baby [Joan] Biffle

media.title: Penny Serenade 4.jpg
media.caption: Photo of Cary Grant and Irene Dunne from the 1941 film Penny Serenade. From Modern Screen magazine. Note that the uploaded photo is larger and of better quality than the magazine photo. A renewal search was done in publications for the years 1968 and 1969. There were no listings for the title "Modern Screen". There's no evidence of continuing copyright on the magazine.

media.caption: Photo of Cary Grant and Irene Dunne from the 1941 film Penny Serenade. From the trade publication Film Bulletin. Note that the uploaded photo is larger and of better quality than the magazine photo. A renewal search was done in publications for the years 1968 and 1969. There were no listings for the title "Film Bulletin". There's no evidence of continuing copyright on the magazine.

media.title: Eva Lee Kuney in Penny Serenade.jpg
media.caption: American child actress Eva Lee Kuney in "Penny Serenade", 1941 film. A drama film about a couple who are divorcing, the wife reminisces on the relationship through records they had acquired throughout the years. This film is in the public domain. Starring Irene Dunne, Cary Grant (in his first of two Academy Award-nominated roles), and Beulah Bondi Story by Martha Cheavens Screenplay by Morrie Rhyskind Directed and Produced by George Stevens

media.title: Penny serenade colorized moonflix 3.0.jpg
media.caption: A frame from the moonflix.com colorization of Penny Serenade (1941) using their newest AI colorization method. Moonflix leads the AI color movement with the best AI colorization on the web as of 2022.
